channel.title: RotaScape 728
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://img692.imageshack.us/img692/4924/rotascapebanner2.png[/img][/CENTER]
I have put quite a lot of money into my server already, and am expecting it to launch probably tomorrow or the day after. I have already bought the domain and such, and basically it's just awaiting a few bug fixes before launch.
I also would like to start off having a good bit of staff though. More details on the server can be found at the link below. I am taking staff applications immediately. Looking to gain about 5-10 P-Mods and 5 Full Mods before release.
[url=http://www.rotascape.net/forums/]http://www.rotascape.net/forums/[/url]

item.title: RotaScape 728
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Soulcist, post:3, topic:453963”]What in the world, gaining 5-10 moderator and 5 other moderators in a total of 15? That is WAY TOO much for a simple, un-discovered like this one.[/quote]^^^^^^^^^^^^

but nice logo
